channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hollywood filmmaker charged with defrauding Netflix of $11 million
item.description: Director Carl Erik Rinsch sold Netflix a sci-fi series. Instead of finishing it, prosecutors allege he spent some of the streamer's money on his own i...

item.title: Zimbabwean millennial Kirsty Coventry gets Olympic top job
item.description: Zimbabwean Olympic swimmer Kirsty Coventry has been elected to head the International Olympic Committee. The two-time gold medalist is marking a whole...

item.title: UK court finds men who stole $6 million gold toilet guilty
item.description: The artwork, titled, America , was stolen from the palace where Winston Churchill was born.

item.title: Netanyahu fires Israel's security chief over 'distrust'
item.description: The Israeli PM cited Shin Bet's failure to anticipate the 7 October attack - but the move has sparked outrage and protests.

item.title: Tesla vandals face up to 20 years in prison, says attorney general
item.description: The US attorney general said a wave of vandalism and arson attacks at Tesla dealerships is "domestic terrorism".

item.title: MDTA missed critical Key Bridge vulnerability assessment prior to collapse, NTSB says
item.description: The Maryland Transportation Authority (MDTA) failed to conduct a critical vulnerability assessment that would have allowed them to identify structural...

item.title: Trump says judge in migrant deportations case is 'Grandstander'
item.description: The judge says the government's filing in the case is "woefully insufficient", but Trump calls him a "Grandstander".

item.title: 3/20: The Daily Report

item.description: Trump Administration misses deadline to give info about deportation flights to El Salvador; GOP leaders warn President Trump against abandoning NATO

item.description: What's next for the Education Department after Trump orders its closure; Reporter's Notebook: Why spring is nature's happiness report

item.title: 3/20: CBS Evening News

item.title: 3 people face federal charges for Tesla attacks. Are such acts domestic terrorism?

item.title: Why Elon Musk's Grok is kicking up a storm in India
item.description: The chatbot has become an "unfiltered and unhinged" digital sensation in India.

item.title: US government cannot deport Georgetown scholar until court rules, judge orders
Trump signs order to begin dismantling of US education department
item.description: The move, which he promised to do on the campaign trail, is already facing legal challenges.

item.title: Florida man is executed for the killings of an 8-year-old girl and her grandmother
Taliban release an American man who was abducted while traveling in Afghanistan
item.description: An American man who was abducted more than two years ago while traveling through Afghanistan as a tourist has been released by the Taliban.
